General.Name: Laurent-Perrier
General.Description: Laurent-Perrier S.A. produces and sells champagne wines. The company sells its products mainly under the Laurent-Perrier, Salon, Delamotte, Champagne, and de Castellane brands. Laurent-Perrier S.A. was founded in 1812 and is headquartered in Tours-sur-Marne, France.
